entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 3. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early this morning. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light early this morning. Temperature steady near minus 3. Wind chill minus 10 this morning and minus 4 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 7. POP 60%
